title: configuration file for mocking cors proxy

$schema.title: config validation only
$schema.description: the schema property isn't used to configure the server, but for validation reasons only

port.title: proxy port
port.description: the port to which the proxy server binds

testUrl.title: monitoring test url
testUrl.description: this path is used to test if the proxy server is still up and running

accessControl.title: access control defails
accessControl.description: detail configuration for access control responses

methods.title: methods to allow
methods.description: http methods to allow in the Access-Control-Allow-Methods response header

requestHeaders.title: request headers to allow
requestHeaders.description: request headers to allow in the Access-Control-Request-Headers response header

maxAge.title: cors max age
maxAge.description: time to cache cors responses before request new cors

security.title: secure cookies
security.description: by default secure options from cookie will get removed
